text: Mossy Creek is a stream in Benton County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary to the Osage River within the Lake of the Ozarks. The stream headwaters arise just east of Missouri Route M at and about two miles west- northwest of the community of Hastain. The stream flows north then east paralleling Route M to its confluence with the Osage south of Lakeview Heights at .Edwards, Missouri (1983) and Lakeview Heights, Missouri 1983; 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangles, United States Geologic Survey Mossy Creek was so named on account of wetlands along its course. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Benton County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Mossy Creek (Missouri)
